title: Putin Orders Army To "Dislodge" Ukraine After Kyiv's Ground Incursion
content: President Vladimir Putin ordered his army on Monday to "dislodge" Ukrainian troops who have entered Russian territory as authorities said over 120,000 people had been evacuated away from the fighting.
summary: President Vladimir Putin ordered his army on Monday to "dislodge" Ukrainian troops who have entered Russian territory as authorities said over 120,000 people had been evacuated away from the fighting.

title: Pak Ex ISI Chief Faiz Hameed Taken Into Army Custody Ahead Of Court Martial
content: Pakistan's former ISI chief Lt Gen (retd.) Faiz Hameed has been arrested by the military ahead of his court martial in connection with a housing scheme scandal, the army said on Monday.
summary: Pakistan's former ISI chief Lt Gen (retd.) Faiz Hameed has been arrested by the military ahead of his court martial in connection with a housing scheme scandal, the army said on Monday.

title: Explained: How Gen Z Women And Military Transformed Bangladesh
content: Adored by her classmates and defiant even after police seized her, student Nusrat Tabassum is one of the many women who helped spearhead the movement that toppled autocratic ex-premier Sheikh Hasina.
summary: Adored by her classmates and defiant even after police seized her, student Nusrat Tabassum is one of the many women who helped spearhead the movement that toppled autocratic ex-premier Sheikh Hasina.

title: Man Arrested For Stabbing Girl, Woman At Leicester Square In London
content: British police said they arrested a man after an 11-year-old girl and a 34-year-old woman were stabbed in Leicester Square, an area in central London popular with tourists.
summary: British police said they arrested a man after an 11-year-old girl and a 34-year-old woman were stabbed in Leicester Square, an area in central London popular with tourists.

title: China Scientists Propose Drilling Holes In Plane Wing To Reduce Sonic Booms
content: This innovative solution could revolutionise the aviation industry, enabling faster-than-sound travel while minimising the negative impacts associated with it.
summary: This innovative solution could revolutionise the aviation industry, enabling faster-than-sound travel while minimising the negative impacts associated with it.

title: "Policy Of Oppression Now Over": New Bangladesh Chief Justice
content: Bangladesh's newly appointed Chief Justice Syed Refaat Ahmed on Monday warned of stern action if anybody from the judiciary was found to be involved in any "misdeeds".
summary: Bangladesh's newly appointed Chief Justice Syed Refaat Ahmed on Monday warned of stern action if anybody from the judiciary was found to be involved in any "misdeeds".

title: Ukrainian Minister Arrested For Taking Bribe Worth Half A Million Dollars
content: A Ukrainian deputy energy minister accused of taking a bribe worth half a million dollars has been arrested along with three alleged accomplices, Ukraine's SBU Security Service said on Monday.
summary: A Ukrainian deputy energy minister accused of taking a bribe worth half a million dollars has been arrested along with three alleged accomplices, Ukraine's SBU Security Service said on Monday.

title: "I'm Ashamed...": Iran President's Deputy Quits Days After Assuming Charge
content: Iran's former foreign minister Javad Zarif, who negotiated a landmark 2015 nuclear deal with major world powers, on Monday announced he had resigned from his new post as vice president.
summary: Iran's former foreign minister Javad Zarif, who negotiated a landmark 2015 nuclear deal with major world powers, on Monday announced he had resigned from his new post as vice president.

title: Israeli Minister Tells US That "Large-Scale" Iranian Attack Expected: Report
content: Israeli Defence Minister Yoav Gallant told U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Sunday that Iran was making preparations for a large-scale military attack on Israel, Axios reporter Barak Ravid said in a post on X.
summary: Israeli Defence Minister Yoav Gallant told U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Sunday that Iran was making preparations for a large-scale military attack on Israel, Axios reporter Barak Ravid said in a post on X.

title: South Korean YouTuber Makes Late-Term Abortion Video, Faces Police Probe
content: The woman claimed to have undergone an abortion in her thirty-sixth week of pregnancy, saying she had only discovered she was pregnant very late in the process.
summary: The woman claimed to have undergone an abortion in her thirty-sixth week of pregnancy, saying she had only discovered she was pregnant very late in the process.

title: UK Woman Killed Her Husband, Hid Body For 18 Years. She Was Never Caught
content: Investigations revealed that Leigh Ann murdered her husband and cleverly concealed his body within her own home for 18 years while abandoning her five children.
summary: Investigations revealed that Leigh Ann murdered her husband and cleverly concealed his body within her own home for 18 years while abandoning her five children.

title: Residents Flee As Greece Wildfires Spread Despite "Superhuman" Efforts
content: Greece ordered the evacuation of hospitals and homes near Athens Monday as wildfires spread despite "superhuman" efforts to combat the flames, the fire brigade said.
summary: Greece ordered the evacuation of hospitals and homes near Athens Monday as wildfires spread despite "superhuman" efforts to combat the flames, the fire brigade said.

title: Tom Cruise Grabbed By Woman, Kissed At Paris Olympics Closing Ceremony
content: Hollywood superstar Tom Cruise was left stunned after a woman grabbed and kissed him forcefully at the closing ceremony of the Paris Olympics 2024.
summary: Hollywood superstar Tom Cruise was left stunned after a woman grabbed and kissed him forcefully at the closing ceremony of the Paris Olympics 2024.

title: "Buy Less, Buy Better": Viral "Underconsumption Core" Trend Explained
content: Social media has long had room only for picture-perfect homes, lavish closets and an abundance of beauty products. But a new trend is sweeping the other way -- urging repurposing, more frugal lifestyles and prioritizing quality over quantity.
summary: Social media has long had room only for picture-perfect homes, lavish closets and an abundance of beauty products. But a new trend is sweeping the other way -- urging repurposing, more frugal lifestyles and prioritizing quality over quantity.

title: High Hopes In Israel For "Super Hero" Cocoa That Has Survived War
content: Farming can develop in mysterious ways. Israeli researchers learned about that when the war in Gaza seemed to have all but wrecked their work on a more resilient strain of the cocoa plant that could help alleviate a global shortage of the beans.
summary: Farming can develop in mysterious ways. Israeli researchers learned about that when the war in Gaza seemed to have all but wrecked their work on a more resilient strain of the cocoa plant that could help alleviate a global shortage of the beans.

title: Elon Musk's X Faces Privacy Complaints Over Data Use In Europe
content: A Vienna-based privacy campaign group lodged complaints in eight European countries against Elon Musk's X on Monday over "unlawfully" feeding the personal data of users into its artificial intelligence technology without their consent.
summary: A Vienna-based privacy campaign group lodged complaints in eight European countries against Elon Musk's X on Monday over "unlawfully" feeding the personal data of users into its artificial intelligence technology without their consent.

title: Tropical Storm Maria Hits Japan, Disrupts Travel, Forces Evacuations
content: Tropical Storm Maria made landfall on Monday in Japan's northern region of Iwate, bringing torrential rain that disrupted flights and rail services while forcing people in some areas to evacuate homes.
summary: Tropical Storm Maria made landfall on Monday in Japan's northern region of Iwate, bringing torrential rain that disrupted flights and rail services while forcing people in some areas to evacuate homes.

title: Bangladesh Police Return To Dhaka Streets After Weeklong Strike
content: Bangladeshi police resumed patrols of the capital Dhaka on Monday, ending a weeklong strike that left a law and order vacuum following the abrupt ouster of autocratic ex-premier Sheikh Hasina.
summary: Bangladeshi police resumed patrols of the capital Dhaka on Monday, ending a weeklong strike that left a law and order vacuum following the abrupt ouster of autocratic ex-premier Sheikh Hasina.

title: 6 Dead As Lightning Strike Causes Park Pavilion To Collapse In China
content: Six people were killed and 10 were injured when a lightning strike caused a park pavilion to collapse in eastern China, state media said Monday.
summary: Six people were killed and 10 were injured when a lightning strike caused a park pavilion to collapse in eastern China, state media said Monday.

title: US Man Stabs Mother To Death After Being Denied Overnight Stay At Home
content: The accused got into an argument with his 74-year-old mother, Barbara Mortimer when she told him he could not stay the night at their family home.
summary: The accused got into an argument with his 74-year-old mother, Barbara Mortimer when she told him he could not stay the night at their family home.
